name: Mosquito Simulator 2015 - The Endless Fun Arcade Game
name_original: Mosquito Simulator 2015 - The Endless Fun Arcade Game
description:
Gameplay-wise, Mosquito Simulator is all about causing as annoying people as you possibly can as a mosquito!

KEY FEATURES
* You can be a mosquito
* Get points for annoying people
* angry Pigs are waiting to lift them up
* In-game physics that splat your brain out all the time
* Seriously look at that mosquito’s wings - fabulous
* Zombies of course :)
* You can be a mosquito

Mosquito Simulator is inspired by the latest in simulator and its technologies, we are just bringing a next-gen Mosquito simulation to YOU. You no longer have to fantasize about being a mosquito, your mobile dreams have finally come true!

Gameplay-wise, Mosquito Simulator is all about causing as annoying people as you possibly can as a mosquito. It has been compared to an old-school skating game, except instead of being a skater, you're a mosqiuto, and instead of doing tricks, you annoy people and doing stuffs. more! When it comes to mosquitos, not even the sky is the limit, as you can probably just bug through it and crash the game.
